__data__.text:
Mid-term test  
Length: 100 minutes  
Answers must be written in English  
 
Problem  1 (2 points ): What is DBMS? Give an example using data manipulation language.  
Problem  2 (3 points ):  
Design for a database of a company, which includes information about staffs, projects, 
departments . Each staff has information about ID, name, level, salary, age; each 
deparment has inforation about department number, address, fuctions; information 
about about projects includes project number, name, and budget. Each staff belongs to 
one department. Each department has many staffs. The ID of staffs in one department 
are completely different, but staffs in different departments may have the same ID. Each 
staff works on many projects. Each project is done by from 2 to 10 staffs .  
Problem  3 (5 points ): Given a set of relations as follows : 
Reader (ID, Name , Age, Address, Gender ) 
Book  (BookID , Name , Author, Type ) 
ScienceBook (BookID -Sc, Field ) 
StoryBook  (BookID -St, Classification ) 
Borrow ( ID, BookID , BorrowDate, DueDate)  
Write SQL statements that produce correct results for each of following queries : 
• Create the above tables and insert at least 3 data rows into each table.  
• Find names of those natural science books that are borrowed by only female 
readers . 
• Find names of those story books of author “Thanh Binh” that are borrowed in 
November 2023.  
• Find names of all fiction story books that have been borrowed by at least 3 
readers.
